marklogic.body: I find it very, very disturbing to read about this study, because I have read that giving with a vaccination can increase the risk of autism. Tylenol lowers Fever. A Fever is the immune system attempting to fight disease. By lowering a Fever, you are taking away the ability of the body to defend itself against disease. Sleeping after shots could increase the risk that the child will stop breathing, especially since the pertussis vaccine in particular affects a baby's breathing.
